entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1400 metres in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
